name: National Institute of Social Rehabilitation and Rural Development (NISRARD)
briefDescription: The organisation was established in the year 1988, keeping in view to uplift the rural poor including rehabilitation of distressed, poor, women and children. The main goal of the organisation is to work for the rehabilitation of the disaster including children, Women, SC/ST and poor. Besides the mission of the organisation is to work for proper development of rural inhabitants. The organisation is determined to work for rehabilitation of distressed women, divorcee, widow and other tortured one. We are taking steps for rehabilitation of distressed children landless poor persons, artisans and other weaker sections of the society. We are interested for development of agriculture, arrangement for irrigation facilities to the land of poor framer
